content.user_title: Set up CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions
content.value_statement: Manual code verification slows down teams and creates inconsistent quality gates. This skill provides ready-to-use GitHub Actions templates for automated linting, testing, building, and deploying your projects with proper branch protection rules.
actual_capabilities: Generate CI workflow YAML for lint, type check, test, build, and security scan stages
Create branch protection rules that require CI status checks before merging
Configure dependency caching to speed up pipeline execution
Set up Dependabot for automatic dependency updates
Create deployment workflows for Vercel preview and production environments
Configure parallel matrix builds across multiple Node.js versions
limitations: Designed for GitHub-hosted runners only (not self-hosted GitHub Actions)
Requires existing GitHub repository with appropriate permissions
Does not configure cloud provider credentials beyond GitHub Secrets

use_cases.title: Automate code quality checks
use_cases.description: Set up linting, type checking, and testing that runs automatically on every push to prevent bugs from being merged.

use_cases.title: Enforce merge requirements
use_cases.description: Configure branch protection rules so no code enters main branch without passing the full CI pipeline.

use_cases.title: Standardize CI/CD practices
use_cases.description: Deploy consistent pipeline templates across multiple repositories with proper caching and parallel execution.

prompt_templates.title: Basic CI setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a CI pipeline for my Node.js project with linting, type checking, testing, and building stages using GitHub Actions.

prompt_templates.title: Add security scan
prompt_templates.prompt: Add npm audit security scanning to our CI pipeline that fails on high severity vulnerabilities.

prompt_templates.title: Configure deployments
prompt_templates.prompt: Set up GitHub Actions workflow to deploy to Vercel on main branch merges with preview deployments for pull requests.

prompt_templates.title: Enable dependency updates
prompt_templates.prompt: Configure Dependabot to automatically create weekly pull requests for outdated npm dependencies grouped by type.

best_practices: Require all CI checks to pass before merging through branch protection rules
Use concurrency groups to cancel outdated runs when new commits are pushed to the same PR
Configure npm audit to run as part of CI and fail on high severity vulnerabilities
anti_patterns: Merging code without CI passing to 'speed up' development
Skipping coverage requirements or setting thresholds too low
Forgetting to update dependencies and ignoring Dependabot PRs

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Works in all conversational contexts where DevOps assistance is needed.

faq.question: How often can CI pipelines run?
faq.answer: GitHub Actions free tier includes 2,000 minutes per month. Paid plans offer more. Use caching to minimize usage.

faq.question: Can this work with other CI providers?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on GitHub Actions. For Jenkins, GitLab CI, or CircleCI, request separate skill templates.

faq.question: Is my code safe in CI pipelines?
faq.answer: GitHub Actions runs in isolated containers. Secrets are encrypted and only available to authorized workflows.

faq.question: Why are my builds slow?
faq.answer: Enable dependency caching, run jobs in parallel, and only run necessary checks. Matrix builds can test multiple versions efficiently.

faq.question: How is this different from manual testing?
faq.answer: CI runs automatically on every change, ensures consistency, blocks merges that fail checks, and provides faster feedback than manual review.
